title: Can't connect to chat or join a game on main account
body:
When I log in on my main account, I can't join a game and can't reconect to chat, on my smurf chat works normal and I just got into a normal game, this doesn't seem to be client problem, this seems to be account problem.

I would really like to hear from riot employee to look into this.

replies.body: I've looked into this for you, but prefer not to share account information through a public venue.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be happy to give more context.  We'll respond asap!

thank you for responding, I did send a support ticket last night and didn't get the answer yet, problem is now on both accounts, I played a game 10 hours ago on my smurf and now I can't connect to chat on either of those and I Don't own 3rd account to check it out
